scripts.build-unit-test-cmake: cmake -S tests/meta -B build/unit-test-release-cmake -GNinja -DBUILD_CONFIG=unit-test-native-release-cmake && cmake --build build/unit-test-release-cmake --verbose --target unit-test
scripts.build-sample-cmake: cmake -S tests/meta -B build/sample-release-cmake -GNinja -DBUILD_CONFIG=sample-native-release-cmake && cmake --build build/sample-release-cmake --verbose --target sample-app
scripts.test-unit-test: xpm run build-unit-test-cmake && xpm run execute-unit-test-cmake
scripts.test-sample: xpm run build-sample-cmake && xpm run execute-sample-cmake
scripts.test: xpm run test-unit-test && xpm run test-sample
